name: NFCNDEFReaderSession
desc: A reader session for detecting NFC Data Exchange Format (NDEF) tags.

items.name: init(delegate: NFCNDEFReaderSessionDelegate, queue: DispatchQueue?, invalidateAfterFirstRead: Bool)
items.desc: Creates and initializes a new NFC NDEF reader session.

items.name: protocol NFCNDEFReaderSessionDelegate
items.desc: A protocol that an object implements to serve as an NDEF reader session delegate.

items.name: func connect(to: NFCNDEFTag, completionHandler: (Error?) -> Void)
items.desc: Connects the reader session to a tag and activates that tag.

items.name: func restartPolling()
items.desc: Restarts the polling sequence so the reader session can discover new tags.
